description: [TrickBot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0266) has used Nt* [Native API](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1106) functions to inject code into legitimate processes such as wermgr.exe.(Citation: Joe Sec Trickbot)

external_references.description: Joe Security. (2020, July 13). TrickBot's new API-Hammering explained. Retrieved September 30, 2021.
